channel.title: Need Command
channel.description: Hey can someone help me create a command for switching prayers and spell book?

item.title: Need Command
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

when i am on Lunar i cant go back to reg spell book because the command doesn’t “work”

Read full topic

item.title: Need Command
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Use google in the future, it’s quite the tool. There are plenty of tutorials.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("switch")) { if (c.inWild()) return; try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int spellbook = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if (spellbook == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else if (spellbook == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else if (spellbook == 2) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } } catch (Exception e){} }

Read full topic
